original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v, users as u, posts as p WHERE c.PostId = p.Id AND u.Id = c.UserId AND v.PostId = p.Id AND c.Score=0 AND u.Views>=0 AND u.Views<=74
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E4.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) <= 74
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E4.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E4E3.PostId=E2.PostId)
